root.message: The COMPILING_ORG field for indicator 17-3-2, translated into en
root.data:
# Data compilers
The government agency in charge of the collection and compilation of the Balance of Payments statistics is the responsible organization for compilation and reporting of the personal remittances data. This information gets reported by the countriesâ€™ government agencies to the International Monetary Fund. The World Bank is the responsible agency for compilation and reporting of the GDP data.
